subject: RE: [Admin] Payment Proposal - 75 Gladstone Street, Kew VIC 3101 - ACCEPTED

full_threads.body:
Hi Ben,

I hope you are doing well.

Confirming we have updated the form. It should have the Fresh Greenery to the list.

Hi Ben,

We are looking into this, we will setup a field that would tally up the amount.
We will work on this in staging first update you tomorrow/Friday.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,


See below from Mikaela/Elaine, Can you please let us know why this is happening and what the resolution is?


Thanks


Regards,

Subject: RE: [Admin] Payment Proposal - 75 Gladstone Street, Kew VIC 3101 - ACCEPTED


Morning Elaine!


Nice pick up - please invoice the amount of $9785


It appears the email sent doesn't factor in the fresh greenery.


@Ben Rookes - are you able to check with Wolf HQ as to why greenery isn't being picked up / why the figures are appearing different (email received vs. proposal platform)

Subject: Re: [Admin] Payment Proposal - 75 Gladstone Street, Kew VIC 3101 - ACCEPTED


Hi Mikaela,
I hope you're well.
I just wanted to clarify something regarding Job ID 9916-JC - Julie Howlett - 75 Gladstone St, Kew 3101. We already have a booking form for this vendor, and earlier today I received the proposal, which has already been accepted.
I'm preparing to send the invoice for this vendor, but I noticed that the total amount shown in the image from the email differs from the total in the online proposal. I'm just a bit unsure which figure to use when creating the invoice, so I wanted to check with you first.
Appreciate your guidance on this!
